articles.author: Jay Busbee
articles.title: Nick Dunlap becomes first amateur to win a PGA Tour event in 33 years - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: The Alabama sophomore held on to win The American Express, making him the first amateur to win a Tour event since Phil Mickelson in 1991.
articles.content: Nick Dunlap, a 20-year-old sophomore at the University of Alabama, made history Sunday at The American Express. Dunlap became the first amateur to win on the PGA Tour since Phil Mickelson 33 years ag… [+3259 chars]
